metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare DLP | Zero Trust Data Loss Prevention
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare DLP is a Zero Trust data loss prevention product that protects data across networks, apps, users, and devices. Learn more about Cloudflare DLP.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention
relatedBlades.subtitle: Unified, consistent data loss prevention (DLP)
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare DLP protects sensitive data consistently across all networks, SaaS and cloud applications, users, and outbound emails, while seamlessly integrating within a Zero Trust architecture. This ensures comprehensive data protection across all channels, minimizing security risks and compliance issues.

columnContent.title: Simplified SaaS security
columnContent.description: Eliminate data exfiltration risks with continuous detection and control over your applications  all from a unified platform.

columnContent.title: Unified policy management
columnContent.description: Easily deploy predefined DLP profiles to monitor and block the sharing of regulated data, including PII, PHI, and financial information.

columnContent.title: Flexible data controls
columnContent.description: Leverage AI-driven context analysis, exact data matches, OCR, and behavioral-based risk scoring for real-time, granular data protection with minimal false positives.

columnContent.title: Seamless Microsoft MIP integrations
columnContent.description:
Increase agility and minimize complexity with powerful integrations
that automatically retrieve sensitivity labels and populate into a DLP profile.

relatedBlades.title: Protect sensitive data across your environment
relatedBlades.copy: It inspects HTTP/S traffic, files, and email content automatically, adapting to evolving threats with context-aware protection. Cloudflare DLP seamlessly integrates within a Zero Trust framework, enhancing visibility, ensuring data is protected across all channels, and enabling organizations to consolidate critical data protection measures in a unified platform.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Cloudflare DLP helps secure sensitive data across all environmentsnetworks, SaaS and cloud applications, users, and outbound emailsby applying customizable, granular policies and real-time, AI-powered detection.

imageAssetFile.altText: How Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention secures sensitive data across all environments

contentfulAsset.description: How Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention secures sensitive data across all environments

buttonOne.elementName: [ZT PMM] Cloudflare DLP - ADDITIONAL OFFER BLADE - CTA

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Security Service Edge (SSE)
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition reflects our continued commitment to provide one security platform that scales seamlessly from network to cloud, protecting all users and data across applications and AI.

columnContent.title: Scored 2nd highest in 'Strategy' category in The Forrester Wave: Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2025
columnContent.description: Forrester cites, "Customers view the platform as technically intuitive and easy to implement, reducing complexity and improving operational efficiency."

columnContent.title: Cloudflare a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave: Email, Messaging, And Collaboration Security Solutions, 2025Q2
columnContent.description: According to the report, "Cloudflare is a solid choice for organizations looking to augment current email, messaging, and collaboration security tooling with deep content analysis and processing and malware detection capabilities."

content.value: "Today, Cloudflare helps prevent our users from sharing sensitive data and code with tools like ChatGPT and Gemini, enabling us to take advantage of AI safely. Going forward, we are excited for Cloudflare's continued innovations to protect data, and in particular, their vision and roadmap for services like DLP and CASB."

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DLP helps secure sensitive data across SaaS applications and code repositories  while preventing data breaches and ensuring compliance with data regulations
relatedBlades.eyebrowHeading: Top Data Loss Prevention use cases

columnContent.title: Protect valuable IP and developer code
columnContent.description: Apply granular DLP controls to reduce data exposure and block users from oversharing sensitive data via the cloud, shadow IT applications, or email.

columnContent.title: Comply with evolving regulations
columnContent.description: Cloudflare DLP automates tracking, control, and auditing of sensitive data to maintain compliance with evolving regulations like GDPR, CCPA, and HIPAA, offering detailed audit trails and seamless SIEM integrations to minimize regulatory risk.

columnContent.title: Enable secure use of AI
columnContent.description: Prevent sensitive data from being uploaded or exposed in Gen AI tools like ChatGPT and Gemini with granular application access control and real-time AI-powered protection.
